successes.title: Bring Reading Rainbow Back for Every Child, Everywhere!
successes.description: Bring Reading Rainbowâ€™s library of interactive books & video field trips to more platforms & provide free access to classrooms in need!

Pledges.description: "I CAN HELP!" Package  // You'll have LeVar's gratitude AND make a difference! You'll also get a Special Thanks on our website, plus exclusive behind-the-scenes updates from LeVar and the team!
THANK YOU Package // All of the rewards above, plus you'll be included in a group thank-you tweet from @ReadingRainbow AND get an exclusive set of downloadable digital wallpapers!

MONTH OF READING Package // All of the rewards above, plus a DIGITAL DOWNLOAD of the special Reading Rainbow Collector's Episode AND a MONTH-LONG subscription to the Reading Rainbow App, with access to the entire Reading Rainbow Library! (More details under REWARDS.)

JUST THE CALENDAR Package // Want to grab a copy of the amazing Reading Rainbow 2015 CALENDAR, featuring new, original art created for us by the artists behind Harry Potter, Lemony Snicket, and tons of your favorite comics and children's books? This is for you! Includes just the 2015 CALENDAR. // This reward does not include the lower reward levels, and is not included  as part of the higher reward levels.
SHOW SOME LOVE! Package // All of the rewards above, plus your choice of a Kickstarter exclusive BUMPER STICKER or FRIDGE MAGNET! (More details under REWARDS.)
PICK ONE Package // All of the rewards above, plus PICK 1 of the following: an exclusive RR Kickstarter T-SHIRT, TOTE BAG or COFFEE MUG! (More details under REWARDS.)
PICK TWO Package // Everything in the $35 package, plus PICK 2 of the following: an exclusive RR Kickstarter T-SHIRT, TOTE BAG or COFFEE MUG! (More details under REWARDS.)
PICK THREE Package // Everything in the $35 package, plus PICK 3 of the following: an exclusive RR Kickstarter T-SHIRT, TOTE BAG and COFFEE MUG! (More details under REWARDS.)
SIGNED HEADSHOT // Don't want all of the other rewards, and just want a headshot? No problem! Get your choice of  AUTOGRAPHED HEADSHOT from LeVar, made out to you, plus his gratitude!
IT'S IN A BOOK Package // Everything in the $100 package, plus a copy of LEVAR'S NEW CHILDREN'S BOOK, before it is released in stores! (More details under REWARDS.)

The PEBBLE + RR SMARTWATCH Package /// Created as a one-time exclusive for this campaign by Team Pebble, this Jet-Black Pebble Smartwatch has LeVar's name laser-etched on the back, gives you early access to a custom watchface featuring 8-BIT LEVAR, and costs LESS than Pebble's retail models! ONLY 500 AVAILABLE! /// Does NOT include any other rewards. If you want the rewards in the $200 package, please add $200 to your total pledge amount.

The PEBBLE + RR SMARTWATCH Package, Round 2 /// MORE ADDED DUE TO  DEMAND!!! /// Created as a one-time exclusive for this campaign by Team Pebble, this Jet-Black Pebble Smartwatch has LeVar's name laser-etched on the back, gives you early access to a custom watchface featuring 8-BIT LEVAR, and costs LESS than Pebble's retail models! ONLY 500 AVAILABLE! /// Does NOT include any other rewards. If you want the rewards in the $200 package, please add $200 to your total pledge amount.
SIGNED HEADSHOT, Round 2 // Don't want all of the other rewards, and just want a headshot? No problem! Get your choice of AUTOGRAPHED HEADSHOT from LeVar, made out to you, plus his gratitude!

READING YEAR-ROUND Package // Everything in the $125 package, plus the Kickstarter exclusive READING RAINBOW 2015 CALENDAR (full of great illustrations AND a place to list all of the books your child reads) AND a full YEAR subscription to the Reading Rainbow app. (More details under REWARDS.)
IT'S IN A (SIGNED) BOOK Package // Everything in the $175 package, plus LeVar's AUTOGRAPH in his new CHILDREN'S BOOK, which you'll get before it is released in stores! (More details under REWARDS.)
IT'S IN A (SIGNED) BOOK Package, Round 2 // Everything in the $175 package, plus LeVar's AUTOGRAPH in his new CHILDREN'S BOOK! (More details under REWARDS.)

PERSONALIZED AUTOGRAPH Package // Everything in the $200 package, plus a personalized AUTOGRAPHED HEADSHOT of your choice from LeVar, calling out how you made this happen! (More details under REWARDS.)

The OUYA + RR GAME CONSOLE Package /// Created as a one-time exclusive with a new "SKY BLUE" color just for this campaign, this Android-based game console and controller are a great way to bring Reading Rainbow -- and hundreds of games and apps -- to any HDMI-enabled screen. Plus, if you get this reward package, your OUYA will come HAND-SIGNED BY LEVAR. ONLY 500 AVAILABLE AS REWARDS. Unsigned version can be added to ANY reward. Add $175 to your pledge, or donate to a school in need for $150.  /// Does NOT include any other rewards. If you want the rewards in the $200 package, please add $200 to your total pledge amount.

PERSONALIZED AUTOGRAPH Package, Round 2 // Everything in the $200 package, plus a personalized AUTOGRAPHED HEADSHOT of your choice from LeVar, calling out how you made this happen! (More details under REWARDS.)

SIGNED ARTIST PRINTS /// A limited edition art print of your favorite artist's contribution to the 2015 Reading Rainbow calendar, signed by the artist AND LeVar. / Once the campaign ends, you'll let us know which artist's print you want. /// Does NOT include any other rewards. If you want the rewards in the $200 package, please add $200 to your total pledge amount!

RRL + THE WOMEN OF STAR TREK (Stand-Alone) /// Bring the family! You'll have 3 TICKETS to join LeVar, Kate Mulgrew, Marina Sirtis, Gates McFadden and Jeri Ryan for a special LIVE event in LOS ANGELES. Youâ€™ll also go home with a few awesome souvenirs and an autograph! // Does NOT include any other rewards or packages. If you want the $200 rewards, please select the $500 version of this reward! // Please note: travel & accommodations are NOT included. Event timing TBD, Winter 2015. More details under REWARDS.

RRL + THE MEN OF STAR TREK (Stand-Alone) /// Bring the family! You'll have 3 TICKETS to join LeVar, Jonathan Frakes, Brent Spiner, Michael Dorn & Robert Picardo for a special LIVE event in LOS ANGELES. Youâ€™ll also go home with a few awesome souvenirs and an autograph! // Does NOT include any other rewards or packages. If you want the $200 rewards, please select the $500 version of this reward! // Please note: travel & accommodations are NOT included. Event timing TBD, Winter 2015. More details under REWARDS.

RRL + WILLIAM SHATNER (Stand-Alone) /// Bring the family! You'll have 3 TICKETS to join LeVar and William Shatner for a special LIVE storytime event in LOS ANGELES. Youâ€™ll also go home with a few awesome souvenirs and an autograph!  // Does NOT include any other rewards or packages. If you want the $200 rewards, please select the $500 version of this reward! // Please note: travel & accommodations are NOT included. Event timing TBD, Winter 2015. More details under REWARDS.

LEVAR FOLLOWS ME Package // Everything in the $200 package, plus @LeVarBurton will FOLLOW YOU ON TWITTER for one year, and LeVar will write a personal tweet to thank you! Almost 2 MILLION people follow LeVar: now HE'LL follow YOU! (More details under REWARDS.)

HANG WITH LEVAR @ A CON!* /// You'll receive 2 FULL PASSES to a Trek or Comic Con, where you and a guest will also hang with LeVar at a PRIVATE VIP Meet & Greet, to get autographs and photos! Plus, you'll each receive a signed headshot, an exclusive collectible, and a special Reading Rainbow/Star Trek DVD! // Choose from conventions in LOUISVILLE, KY (Aug 1-3); PITTSBURGH, PA (Aug 8-10); CHICAGO, IL (Aug 21-24); MONTREAL, Canada (Sept 12-14); LONDON, UK (Oct 3-5). // Please note: travel & accommodations are NOT included. No other rewards included.

SIGNED HEADSHOT + TWITTER FOLLOW // Get your choice of AUTOGRAPHED HEADSHOT from LeVar, made out to you. PLUS, LeVar will follow YOU on Twitter for one year! Almost 2 MILLION people follow LeVar: now HE'LL follow YOU! // (No other rewards included. More details under REWARDS.)

ADOPT A CLASSROOM Package // A classroom of YOUR CHOICE will be one of the first to get access to Reading Rainbow's new classroom app, and LeVar will record a personal video message for the class! (Includes a year-long  classroom subscription.)

LEVAR FOLLOWS ME, Round 2 // Everything in the $200 package, plus @LeVarBurton will FOLLOW YOU ON TWITTER for one year, and LeVar will write a personal tweet to thank you! Almost 2 MILLION people follow LeVar: now HE'LL follow YOU! (More details under REWARDS.)
LEVAR VOICEMAIL Package // Everything in the $200 package, plus LeVar will record a personalized VOICEMAIL message for your incoming calls! (More details under REWARDS.)

LEVAR FOLLOWS ME, Round 3 // Everything in the $200 package, plus @LeVarBurton will FOLLOW YOU ON TWITTER for one year, and LeVar will write a personal tweet to thank you! Almost 2 MILLION people follow LeVar: now HE'LL follow YOU! (More details under REWARDS.)

KATEE SACKHOFF & THE CAST OF BSG + READING RAINBOW LIVE! /// Bring the kids! You'll have 3 TICKETS to join LeVar, Katee Sackhoff, and her friends from Battlestar Galactica (Edward James Olmos, Jamie Bamber, Michael Trucco & Tricia Helfer) for a special LIVE event in LOS ANGELES, where the group will read stories to you and your kids! You'll get to MEET LeVar and the cast after the event for photos and signatures, and youâ€™ll also go home with a few awesome souvenirs and an autograph! /// Please note: travel & accommodations are NOT included. Event will be in Los Angeles in August 2014. Exact date TBD. Does NOT include any other rewards. If you want the rewards in the $200 package, please add $200 to your total pledge amount.
LEVAR VOICEMAIL Package, Round 2 // Everything in the $200 package, plus LeVar will record a personalized VOICEMAIL message for your incoming calls! (More details under REWARDS.)

RRL + WILLIAM SHATNER /// Bring the family! You'll have 3 TICKETS to join LeVar and William Shatner for a special LIVE storytime event in LOS ANGELES. Youâ€™ll also go home with a few awesome souvenirs and an autograph! PLUS, you get everything in the $200 package! // Please note: travel & accommodations are NOT included. (Date TBD, Fall 2014. More details under REWARDS.)

RRL + THE MEN OF STAR TREK /// Bring the family! You'll have 3 TICKETS to join LeVar, Jonathan Frakes, Brent Spiner, Michael Dorn & Robert Picardo for a special LIVE event in LOS ANGELES. Youâ€™ll also go home with a few awesome souvenirs and an autograph! PLUS, you get everything in the $200 package! // Please note: travel & accommodations are NOT included. Event timing TBD, Spring 2015.

RRL + THE WOMEN OF STAR TREK /// Bring the family! You'll have 3 TICKETS to join LeVar, Kate Mulgrew, Marina Sirtis, Gates McFadden and Jeri Ryan for a special LIVE event in LOS ANGELES. Youâ€™ll also go home with a few awesome souvenirs and an autograph! PLUS, you get everything in the $200 package! // Please note: travel & accommodations are NOT included. Event timing TBD. More details under REWARDS.

CHAT WITH LEVAR Package // Everything in the $200 package, plus a 5-10 minute VIDEO CHAT or PHONE CALL with LeVar himself! Let your friends join you, or keep the time for yourself. (More details under REWARDS.)

CHAT WITH LEVAR, Round 2 // Everything in the $200 package, plus a 5-10 minute VIDEO CHAT or PHONE CALL with LeVar himself! Let your friends join you, or keep the time for yourself. (More details under REWARDS.)

OFFICIAL STAR TREK CONVENTION + MEET LEVAR in LAS VEGAS! // You and a guest will receive two full passes to attend the STAR TREK CONVENTION in LAS VEGAS in JULY 2014, where you'll also attend a private VIP Meet & Greet with LeVar. Get an autograph, take a selfie, or just ask him a few questions: your choice! Plus, you'll each get a signed headshot! // Please note: travel & accommodations are NOT included. More details under REWARDS.)

ATTEND FANDOMFEST + MEET LEVAR in LOUISVILLE! // You and a guest will receive two full passes to attend the FANDOM FEST in LOUISVILLE, KY in AUGUST 2014, where you'll also attend a private VIP Meet & Greet with LeVar. Get an autograph, take a selfie, or just ask him a few questions: your choice! Plus, you'll each get a signed headshot! // Please note: travel & accommodations are NOT included. More details under REWARDS.)

ATTEND WIZARD WORLD + MEET LEVAR in CHICAGO! // You and a guest will receive two full passes to attend the WIZARD WORLD COMIC CON in CHICAGO in AUGUST 2014, where you'll also attend a private VIP Meet & Greet with LeVar. Get an autograph, take a selfie, or just ask him a few questions: your choice! Plus, you'll each get a signed headshot! // Please note: travel & accommodations are NOT included. More details under REWARDS.)

HELP A LIBRARY Package /// We don't have a LIBRARY version of the Reading Rainbow app (yet!), but while we work on it, this reward lets you donate a COMPLETE DVD SET of the original television series (152 CLASSIC EPISODES) to the LIBRARY of your choice! Plus, we'll put a special label on the box, crediting you as the sponsor! /// Please note: does not include any other rewards. Additional sets available as ADD-ONS.

VERONICA MARS + READING RAINBOW LIVE! /// Bring the kids, Marshmallows. You'll have 3 TICKETS to join LeVar and the stars of VERONICA MARS -- Kristen Bell, Enrico Colantoni and Jason Dohring -- for a special LIVE event in LOS ANGELES, where the group will read stories to you and your kids! Youâ€™ll also go home with a few awesome souvenirs and an autograph! /// Please note: travel & accommodations are NOT included. Date TBD, Spring 2015. Does NOT include any other rewards. If you want the rewards in the $200 package, please add $200 to your total pledge amount.

The PONO + RR COLLECTOR'S EDITION PONOPLAYER Package /// Created as a one-time exclusive for this campaign by PonoMusic, this sleek chrome PonoPlayer is engraved with LeVar's signature, preloaded with tracks, and offers a music listening experience second to none. ONLY 20 AVAILABLE! /// Does NOT include any other rewards. If you want the rewards in the $200 package, please add $200 to your total pledge amount.

READING RAINBOW LIVE in LOS ANGELES // Take the family! You'll have 3 TICKETS to see LeVar read a few books AND you'll join him for a PRIVATE MEET & GREET, where you can get autographs and take photos. PLUS, you get everything in the $200 package! // Please note: travel & accommodations are NOT included.  (Date TBD. More details under REWARDS.)

PLUS, you get everything in the $200 package! // Please note: travel & accommodations are NOT included.  (Date TBD. More details under REWARDS.)

You'll have 3 TICKETS to join LeVar, Kate Mulgrew, Marina Sirtis, Gates McFadden & Jeri Ryan for a special LIVE EVENT with a storytime + Q&A in LOS ANGELES. RRL + PATRICK STEWART /// Bring the family! You'll have 3 TICKETS to join LeVar and Patrick Stewart for a special LIVE EVENT with a storytime + Q&A in NEW YORK CITY. Youâ€™ll also go home with a few awesome souvenirs and an autograph! PLUS, you get everything in the $200 package! // Please note: travel & accommodations are NOT included. (Date TBD, Fall 2014. More details under REWARDS.)

RR LIVE! withâ€¦ PATRICK STEWART (Early Bird) // Bring the family! You'll have 3 TICKETS to join LeVar and Patrick Stewart for a special LIVE storytime event in NEW YORK CITY. Youâ€™ll also go home with a few awesome souvenirs and an autograph! PLUS, you get everything in the $200 package! // Please note: travel & accommodations are NOT included. (Date TBD, b/w Aug 2014-June 2015. More details under REWARDS.)

GROUP PICNIC with LEVAR // You and a guest will join LeVar and a small group of fellow backers for a picnic lunch in Los Angeles!  PLUS, you get everything in the $200 package! // Please note: travel & accommodations are NOT included. (Date TBD. More details under REWARDS.)

RR LIVE! + MEET & GREET withâ€¦ PATRICK STEWART (Early Bird) // Bring the family! You'll have 3 TICKETS to join LeVar and Patrick Stewart for a special LIVE storytime event in NEW YORK CITY. Youâ€™ll also go home with a few awesome souvenirs and an autograph!  Afterward, youâ€™ll get time to talk to LeVar and Patrick at a small Meet & Greet. PLUS, you get everything in the $200 package! // Please note: travel & accommodations are NOT included. (Date TBD, b/w Aug 2014-June 2015. More details under REWARDS.)

GROUP PICNIC & VIDEO FIELD TRIP with LEVAR // You and a guest will join LeVar and a small group of fellow backers for a picnic lunch, and THEN you'll both appear as extras in a Reading Rainbow video field trip! PLUS, you get everything in the $200 package! // Please note: travel & accommodations are NOT included. (Date TBD. More details under REWARDS.)

GROUP PICNIC & VIDEO FIELD TRIP with LEVAR, Round 2 // You and a guest will join LeVar and a small group of fellow backers for a picnic lunch, and THEN you'll both appear as extras in a Reading Rainbow video field trip! PLUS, you get everything in the $200 package! // Please note: travel & accommodations are NOT included. (Date TBD. More details under REWARDS.)

PRIVATE DINNER with LEVAR // You and a guest will be LeVar's personal guests for a PRIVATE DINNER in Los Angeles. This is your chance to ask Geordi, Kunta, or the Butterfly-in-the-Sky Guy anything YOU want! PLUS, you get everything in the $200 package! // Please note: travel & accommodations are NOT included. (Date TBD. More details under REWARDS.)

PRIVATE DINNER with LEVAR // You and a guest will be LeVar's personal guests for a PRIVATE DINNER in Los Angeles. This is your chance to ask Geordi, Kunta, or the Butterfly-in-the-Sky Guy anything YOU want! PLUS, you get everything in the $200 package! // Please note: travel & accommodations are NOT included. (Date TBD. More details under REWARDS.)

SET VISIT to PERCEPTION /// You and a friend will visit the set of LeVar's television show, PERCEPTION, where you'll be his guests for a day! Watch scenes being shot, go behind-the-scenes, meet some of the cast, and have lunch with LeVar himself! PLUS, you get everything in the $200 package! /// Please note: travel to Los Angeles & accommodations are NOT included. Visit will be scheduled for a date that works for you during the 2015 production season.

SET VISIT to PARENTHOOD /// You and a friend will visit the set of the hit show PARENTHOOD, where you'll be the personal guests of EP Sarah Watson for a day! Watch scenes being shot, go behind-the-scenes, meet some of the cast, and have lunch on set! PLUS, you get everything in the $200 package! /// Please note: travel to Los Angeles & accommodations are NOT included. Visit will be scheduled for a date that works for you during the fall 2014 production season.

PRIVATE DINNER with LEVAR, Round 2 // You and a guest will be LeVar's personal guests for a PRIVATE DINNER in NYC or LA -- your choice! This is your chance to ask Geordi, Kunta, or the Butterfly-in-the-Sky Guy anything YOU want! PLUS, you get everything in the $200 package! // Please note: travel & accommodations are NOT included. (Date TBD. More details under REWARDS.)

ADOPT A SCHOOL Package // An entire SCHOOL of YOUR CHOICE will be one of the first to get access to Reading Rainbow's new classroom app, and LeVar will record a personal video message for the school! Includes up to 20 year-long classroom subscriptions! (More details under REWARDS.)

SCHOOL ASSEMBLY WITH LEVAR // LeVar himself will visit the school of your choice to read live for children and teachers in a school assembly! Afterward, you can meet him in person, at a private Meet & Greet for teachers and parents! PLUS, this includes everything in the $5000 ADOPT A SCHOOL Package! // // Please note: LeVar's travel & accommodations are only included for locations in the continental USA. (Date TBD. More details under REWARDS.)

The ULTIMATE STAR TREK "VISOR" Package -- NOW WITH ADDED DATA! // You and a friend will join LeVar and Brent Spiner for a PRIVATE DINNER in Los Angeles, and you will get to wear the ONE-AND-ONLY ORIGINAL VISOR that LeVar wore in ST:TNG. A once-in-a-lifetime opportunity! Also includes FOUR 1-DAY PASSES to a selected FAN CONVENTION of your choice where you'll get to bring friends to a private Meet & Greet with LeVar, who will already be an old friend from your dinner. Also includes four personalized, signed HEADSHOTS from LeVar - one for you, and one for each of your friends! // Please note: travel & accommodations are NOT included. (Date TBD. More details under REWARDS.)

LIBRARY VISIT FROM LEVAR // LeVar himself will visit the school or library of your choice to read to children and parents in a special storytime gathering! Afterward, the sponsoring backers can meet him in person, at a private Meet & Greet! Also includes the COMPLETE DVD SET of the ORIGINAL TELEVISION SERIES (152 EPISODES) for the library to keep! // No other rewards included. Please note: LeVar's travel & accommodations are only included for locations in the contiguous USA. Remote locations may require an additional travel fee. (Date TBD. More details under REWARDS.)
